text: Hagi maka zanka'ama aguzama eme neruza maka zanka'ama eri hana'ma hu'za nevaza vahe'moka kagra na'a hugahane? Nahigenka kagra korankre hentofa kukena hu'nenka, golireti'ma tro'ma hu'naza avasase zantamina eri nehankrenka kavurera penia fre'nane? E'ina avasase zantamima eri hankare'nana zantamimo'a kaza osugahie. Na'ankure kagrama kavesi nezmantana vahe'mo'za, kagrira kavesinogante'za kahe frisaza kanku nehakaze.
